node.title: A Pie Dish Made of Porcelain
node.description: Made Inâ€™s new pie plate comes with a stripe of blue or red and will accommodate recipes for nine-inch pies.
node.content: ["Baking and serving, with pie as the obvious candidate, are the designated purposes for this French dish, though it\u2019s amenable to other foods, even unbaked. A new addition to Made In\u2019s line of handsome yet utilitarian porcelain, it\u2019s a standard 9 inches in diameter, inside, rim to rim, and 10.7 inches wide overall. The capacity is six cups. You select a stripe of blue or red on the edge. Give a homemade pie in it and let the recipient keep the dish.", "Follow NYT Food on Twitter and NYT Cooking on Instagram, Facebook and Pinterest. Get regular updates from NYT Cooking, with recipe suggestions, cooking tips and shopping advice."]
